Package org.opentrafficsim.core.network Description

Classes that build a network with nodes, links, cross-sections and possibly lanes.

The network classes are independent of the type of vehicle (GTU) that is used. Specific subclasses for roads, rail, shipping lanes, or planes should be added to sub-packages with names like road, rail, ship, pedestrians, and air.
Geometry classes can be added for animation, as well as a detailed cross-section of the links on the network. The d2 sub-package adds 2-dimensional spaces to the network for e.g., parking places and pedestrian movements.

Copyright (c) 2013-2014 Delft University of Technology, PO Box 5, 2600 AA, Delft, the Netherlands. All rights reserved.

See for project information www.opentrafficsim.org.
